reviews.text: We love Stavs and go every time we are in the area. My son loves the stacker. I always switch it up and try something new. And it's all been great

I'm not sure how to write this review. Local divey diner. Food was fine, service was fine, ambiance was fine.

Two adults two grade school aged children. We...
UPDATE: Returned today after two and a half years and had the blueberry pancakes.  They were absolutely scrumptious (if a little on the small side).
